snapshot.cta.label: Contact us
snapshot.header.subtitleHtml: Modern website widgets—fast to launch, easy to customize, and built to help you convert.
snapshot.header.title: FAQs
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.0.answer: Clickeen is a widget SaaS platform that lets you add polished, high-performing widgets to your website in minutes—no heavy dev work required.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.0.question: What is Clickeen?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.1.answer: Yes. The Free plan includes 1 active widget with essential features so you can try Clickeen on a live site.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.1.question: Do you offer a free plan?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.2.answer: Create your widget, copy the embed code, and paste it right before the closing </body> tag on your website. Changes you make in Clickeen update instantly.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.2.question: How do I install a widget on my site?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.3.answer: Launch faster with flexible design controls, simple updates, and reliable performance—so your team can ship improvements without maintaining custom code.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.3.question: Why use Clickeen instead of building widgets from scratch?
snapshot.sections.0.title: Getting started
